entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Collingwood
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 9:26 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Collingwood 01:00 AM EST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Temperature: -0.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -4
Dewpoint: -3.6°C
Wind: NW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries or periods of freezing drizzle ending overnight then cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 1. Forecast issued 8:29 PM EST Monday 09 January 2023
